DOC.brief_summary: Diabetes-specific nutritional formula ( DSNFs ) frequently use part medical nutrition therapy patient type 2 diabetes order improve glycemic control enhance weight reduction . The mechanism DSNFs improve postprandial ( PP ) plasma glucose yet know . The aim study compare effect 2 DSNFs versus oatmeal PP plasma glucose , serum insulin serum active glucagon-like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) , serum free fatty acid ( FFA ) serum triglyceride ( TG ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes treat oral diabetes medication Type 1 diabetes
